abstract.t: The Certificate options for DHCP-PD RFC3633 [4] provide a mechanismto deliver, along with the IPv6 prefix, the certificate or theinformation needed to obtain a certificate entitling the clientrouter to advertise the prefix delegated to it. This information isneccesary if Secure Neighbor Discovery RFC3971 [6] is used by thedevices connected to the DHCP-PD client router.
